name: banking-api
description: A secure serverless REST API for managing bank accounts and transactions with JWT authentication, built with AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and API Gateway.

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:layer
scripts.build:layer: powershell -Command "Copy-Item layer/nodejs/package*.json dist/layer/nodejs -Force" && npm ci --omit=dev --prefix dist/layer/nodejs
